page.title: 12LOCAL HISTORY.
page.content:
One day some fishermen were coming in to land their fish on the shore.Suddleny one of the men saw a red figure standing at the top of his voice,and he grabbed the nets and ran up a hill (Carne Road)(which is just behind our school)and on to a rock at the top of a cliff.The fisherman stopped,knelt down and started to pray.The Devil stopped and put his hands over his ears and then began to shout",STOP, STOP."They prayed louder.Suddenly the Devil ran down the beach and jumped into the water.But the shape of the nets his laddle and the Devils feet are engraved on the rock.So they have called it Devils rock ever since!The marks can still be seen to this day.
.
